TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ExceptionHandler extends System.Object

summary.span: 擴充 類別，建立 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 執行階段中所發生未處理之例外狀況的例外處理常式。

span.span: Extend the class to create an exception handler for unhandled exceptions that occur within the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充 類別並覆寫 方法，以判定例外狀況是否應該結束應用程式。Extend the class and override the method to determine whether an exception should terminate the application. 接著，建立自訂 類別的新執行個體，並且在建立 用戶端或服務之前，將它指派給靜態 或 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 屬性。Then create a new instance of your custom class and assign it to the static or property prior to creating [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] clients or services. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範會覆寫 方法的 抽象類別 (Abstract Class) 實作。The following code example shows an implementation of the abstract class that overrides the method. [!code-csharp[S_UEExceptionHandler#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueexceptionhandler/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UEExceptionHandler#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueexceptionhandler/vb/module1.vb#0)] 下列程式碼範例將示範如何針對 `MyExceptionHandler` 執行階段中所發生的未處理例外狀況啟用自訂 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]。The following code example shows how to enable the custom `MyExceptionHandler` for unhandled exceptions that occur within the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] runtime. [!code-csharp[S_UEExceptionHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueexceptionhandler/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEExceptionHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueexceptionhandler/vb/module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AlwaysHandle As ExceptionHandler

summary.span: 取得處理所有例外狀況的 執行個體。

span.span: Gets an instance of that handles all exceptions.

value.span: 物件，這個物件會為所有例外狀況傳回 。

span.span: An object that returns for all exceptions.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Property AsynchronousThreadExceptionHandler As ExceptionHandler

public: static property System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::ExceptionHandler ^ AsynchronousThreadExceptionHandler { System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::ExceptionHandler ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::ExceptionHandler ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式定義域的目前 實作。

span.span: Gets or sets the current implementation for the application domain.

value.span: 指派自訂 物件，這個物件會接收非同步 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 執行緒上所發生的未處理例外狀況。

span.span: Assign a custom object that receives unhandled exceptions that occur on asynchronous [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設， 屬性為 `null`，而且非同步 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 執行緒上的未處理例外狀況會結束該應用程式。By default, the property is `null`, and unhandled exceptions on asynchronous [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] threads terminate the application. 將這個屬性設定為 物件，便可接收和回應這些例外狀況。Set this property to an object to receive and react to these exceptions. 如果未處理的例外狀況發生在非同步 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 執行緒上，並且會抵達這個處理常式，這時應用程式定義域的狀態可能會被洩露。If an unhandled exception occurs on an asynchronous [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] thread and reaches this handler, the state of the application domain may be compromised. 不應該傳回`true`這些例外狀況。 should not return `true` for these exceptions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool HandleException(class System.Exception exception) cil managed

param.name: exception
param.span: 例外狀況發生在 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 執行階段中，而這可能會結束應用程式。

span.span: The exception the occurred within the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] runtime and which may terminate the application.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，如果例外狀況已處理，則傳回 ，如果應該重新擲回例外狀況並結束應用程式，則傳回 。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns if the exception has been handled, or if the exception should be rethrown and the application terminated.

returns.span: 如果已處理例外狀況，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the exception has been handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已處理例外狀況， 屬性會傳回 `true`。The property returns `true` if the exception has been handled. 如果是傳回 `false` 或擲回不同的例外狀況，則會重新擲回原始例外狀況。If it returns `false` or throws a different exception, the original exception is rethrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範會覆寫 方法的 抽象類別 (Abstract Class) 實作。The following code example shows an implementation of the abstract class that overrides the method. 下列程式碼範例將示範如何針對 `MyExceptionHandler` 執行階段中所發生的未處理例外狀況啟用自訂 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]。The following code example shows how to enable the custom `MyExceptionHandler` for unhandled exceptions that occur within the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] runtime.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Property TransportExceptionHandler As ExceptionHandler

public: static property System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::ExceptionHandler ^ TransportExceptionHandler { System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::ExceptionHandler ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Dispatcher::ExceptionHandler ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式定義域的目前傳輸 實作。

span.span: Gets or sets the current transport implementation for the application domain.

value.span: 自訂的 物件，這個物件會接收全域 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 傳輸中所發生的未處理例外狀況。

span.span: A custom object that receives unhandled exceptions that occur within the global [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] transports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設， 屬性會設定為 的值，這樣會使得 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 傳輸中發生的未處理例外狀況被忽略。By default, the property is set to the value of , causing unhandled exceptions within [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] transports to be ignored. 將這個屬性為 的執行個體來接收和回應這些例外狀況。Set this property to an instance of to receive and react to these exceptions. 如果未處理的例外狀況發生在全域 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 傳輸中，並且會抵達這個處理常式，這時應用程式定義域的狀態可能會被洩漏。If an unhandled exception occurs within a global [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] transport and reaches this handler, there is a possibility that the state of the application domain is compromised. 可以傳回`false`這些例外狀況，將應用程式終止。 can return `false` for these exceptions to cause the application to be terminated.
